Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel Eurostars Panorama places you in the heart of Paris, minutes from Folies Bergere and close to Louvre Museum. This hotel is close to Notre Dame Cathedral and Arc de Triomphe.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 43 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

A stay at Hotel Eurostars Panorama places you in the heart of Paris, minutes from Folies Bergere and close to Louvre Museum. This hotel is close to Notre Dame Cathedral and Arc de Triomphe.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Folies Bergere - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Paris Museum of Freemasonry - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Grand Rex Cinema - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Passage Verdeau - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi

Hotel Drouot - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

Theatre la Bruyere - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Paris Bourse - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Opera Comique - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Gustave Moreau Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Montmartre Funicular - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Sacred Heart Basilica - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 16 km / 10 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 21.5 km / 13.4 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Eurostars Panorama is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Hotel Eurostars Panorama are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 16 km / 10 mi
Paris (CDG-Charles de Gaulle) - 19.9 km / 12.4 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Eurostars Panorama is Paris (CDG-Charles de Gaulle).
